pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a daemon and Kernel module to allow connection of a Linux computer to any AES67-compatible Audio-over-IP network like Dante or Ravenna. The daemon allows configuring virtual ALSA devices to send and receive audio to and from the AES67-compatible network by simply interacting with ALSA as if the devices were actual sound cards, much like Dante Virtual Soundcard does for Windows computers in Dante networks.
